page.title: 14Trade, Rehabilitation.
page.content: Near Bordon, Firhill Plant Hire, hire out heavy diggers, and a design developement company deals with buildings and developments. The Post Office Stores at Passfield is the only shop in the area. It is quite small. The Grange,Standford,a large country house is in use as a rehabilitation centre for recidivists, people on probation or exprisoners. They are taught self sufficiency, by helping in the kitchen, in the garden, and with animals. The large grounds provide space and opportunity to rear animals and poultry. Eggs,vegetables and goats milk are advertised. It is hoped that some will be able to take jobs where accomodation is also provided. Currently there are 12 men and 2 women. The local community makes contact, and a craft centre at the Grange is proposed.
